prompt: The Product Photography with studio setting. The style creates a deep cosmic gradient studio environment with mysterious color transitions and stellar sophistication, producing an atmosphere of refined mystery and cosmic beauty through gradient lighting and dramatic composition. The upper left quadrant features deep purple walls that gradually transition to midnight blue tones, creating a beautiful cosmic gradient that flows mysteriously across the space. The lighting enhances the gradient beautifully with deep, stellar light. The upper right quadrant continues the cosmic gradient with midnight blue transitioning to soft indigo tones, maintaining the mysterious flow while creating visual interest through the smooth color transitions. The middle left quadrant introduces a cosmic geometric pedestal that catches the gradient lighting beautifully, its surface reflecting the cosmic colors and creating stellar highlights that emphasize the gradient effect. The middle right quadrant features geometric elements in complementary cosmic tones that enhance the gradient flow, their forms creating visual interest while maintaining the mysterious color harmony. The bottom left quadrant shows the gradient continuing onto the floor with deep purple tones that provide grounding and continuity with the upper space, creating a seamless transition that enhances the cosmic atmosphere. The bottom right quadrant completes with soft indigo flooring that provides stellar contrast and visual balance, its mysterious tones creating a cosmic foundation while maintaining the cohesive cosmic gradient palette. The overall atmosphere is cosmic, sophisticated, and mysterious, perfect for elegant products and sophisticated presentations.

The style creates a classic Rembrandt lighting studio environment with dramatic shadows and warm sophistication, producing an atmosphere of refined drama and classic beauty through professional lighting and artistic composition. The Product Photography with studio setting. The style creates a professional three-point lighting studio environment with balanced illumination and sophisticated control, producing an atmosphere of refined professionalism and perfect lighting through professional lighting techniques and precise composition. The upper left quadrant features neutral gray walls that provide the perfect backdrop for professional three-point lighting, allowing the key light, fill light, and back light to work in harmony. The lighting is carefully balanced to eliminate harsh shadows while maintaining dimension. The upper right quadrant continues with the same neutral gray tones that enhance the professional lighting setup, creating a clean environment where the three-point lighting can work its magic. The middle left quadrant introduces a professional geometric pedestal positioned at the center of the three-point lighting setup, its surface perfectly illuminated by the key light while the fill light softens shadows and the back light creates separation from the background. The middle right quadrant features geometric elements positioned to demonstrate the three-point lighting effectiveness, their forms showing how the professional lighting creates perfect illumination with controlled shadows and highlights. The bottom left quadrant shows neutral gray flooring that reflects the three-point lighting beautifully, creating a seamless continuation of the professional lighting effect and providing perfect grounding for the composition. The bottom right quadrant completes with the same neutral tones that enhance the professional three-point lighting, its clean colors creating a professional foundation while maintaining the cohesive lighting palette. The overall atmosphere is professional, balanced, and sophisticated, perfect for corporate products and professional presentations.
